    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resource)
      Used when view is opened. Sets initial values and fields required for view operation.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resource - used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • handleSelectFlavor

      protected void handleSelectFlavor()
      Action handler for the combo box of pizza flavors. Allows user to select pizza flavor from combo box.

    • handleSizeChange

      protected void handleSizeChange()
      Action handler for radio buttons dealing with pizza size. Allows users to change the size of pizza they are ordering.

    • handleAddTopping

      protected void handleAddTopping()
      Action handler for button to add pizza toppings. Allows user to select up to 7 toppings to add to their build your own pizza.

    • handleRemoveTopping

      protected void handleRemoveTopping()
      Action handler for button to remove pizza toppings. Allows user to remove toppings from their build your own pizza.

    • handleAddToOrder

      protected void handleAddToOrder()
      Action handler for add to order button. Allows user to add current pizza to order.
